Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I can't believe you joined forces with us,
Link! <sp:5:0:0>Though, I admit, I hoped you would
ever since we met at Hyrule Castle.
The monster-control crew is battling those
awful things all over Hyrule,<sp:5:0:0> trying to
bring some measure of peace.
<snd:Understand_01>And thanks to you, we were able to
complete our mission here.
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>We plan to head <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> after this,<sp:5:0:0>
to <clr:0000>Fort Hateno<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>.
Talk1017:
It's an honor to see you again!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Unfortunately, there's no time to enjoy
this meeting...

It's the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>. It revived those awful
monsters, and they've become a scourge
to this region.
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:WorkHeavy_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>But mark my words!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>The monster-control crew is here, and
their foul days are numbered!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>Once we're <clr:0000>close to their position<clr:ffff>, we'll
get ready and then <clr:0000>attack<clr:ffff> as soon as the
right moment presents itself.
Come, let's do this together. Let's bring
peace back to this region!
Talk1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>With a captain like ours in charge, I could
go on fighting forever!
Talk_020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>You've got to be extra careful in this
<clr:0000>thunderstorm<clr:ffff>. Be sure you aren't
wearing any <clr:0000>metal<clr:ffff>!
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yet another incredible battle. You've
saved us once again.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand>We're closing in on a monster stronghold
up ahead.

Once we <clr:0000>approach<clr:ffff> their base, we'll wait
for the right moment and then <clr:0000>launch
our attack<clr:ffff>.
<snd:Admiration_01>But no hasty moves here.<sp:5:1:0> We have to
approach with caution.
Talk_021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>I want this finished before the night takes
hold. Please, help us if you can!
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>Link, that weapon of yours...it's the famed
<clr:0000>Master Sword<clr:ffff>, isn't it.

I'd heard it was a special sword, but this!
It has a real divine glow about it!

<snd:Understand_01>Just looking at it makes me feel like
there's this power welling up inside me.
Thank you so much for letting me see it.
Talk1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yet another incredible battle. You've
saved us once again. <sp:5:0:0>Eh...

<sp:3:0:2:0400>That weapon on your back! It's the
famed <clr:0000>Master Sword<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>I heard it was a special sword, but...<sp:5:0:0>this!
It has a divine glow about it.

Just looking at it makes me feel like power
is welling up inside me. Thank you so
much for showing it to me.
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sigh_01>My monster-control crew is in the midst
of a strike on the monsters that have
plagued this area.
But just look... What a disaster...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_01>Please, Link, can you help us?
Talk1026: <sp:3:0:2:0700>We will bring peace back to Hyrule!
Talk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>Now's your chance! The monsters are just
waking up! Help us!
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Thanks for joining us! Those monsters
are in for an unpleasant surprise!
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Time to get fired up! This monster-control
crew is gonna destroy those monsters!
Talk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>We'll be at a disadvantage if the fight
stretches on too long. Please, help us
if you can!
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're here to help, check in with the
<clr:0000>captain on duty<clr:ffff> nearby!
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>With the Goddess Hylia's divine
protection, I'm sure to make the
captain proud.
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>May the Goddess Hylia offer me her
divine protection.
Talk_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>I want this finished before the sun rises.
Please, help us if you can!
Talk1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I told you not to talk to me! It's a
dangerous distraction!
Talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>With the captain watching over us, I've
got all the confidence I need.
Talk_019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>Now's your chance! The <clr:0000>rain will muffle
your footsteps<clr:ffff>! Help us if you can!
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As always, I want to reward you. Please,
take this.
Talk1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Focus on the fight. We've got to take
them out!
Talk1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I told you, I'm really not in the mood
to talk right now!
Talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>If we win this fight, I'm gonna get myself
a horse and ride it.
Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Link! I was sure I'd see you again!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I have terrible news. The <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>...
it revived those awful monsters, and now
they've become a scourge to this region.
We attacked them with everything we
had, but...what a disaster.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>My forces have been decimated. I'm
desperate to help them, but if I'm
taken out too...
Please, you've got to help my squad.
You've got to destroy the monsters.
Talk1050: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>If you need something, talk to the captain.
Talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All of this is worth it to bring peace
to Hyrule.
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>What a disaster.<sp:5:0:0> It's my fault we've failed
so badly... My inexperience led to this.

I have to do something to save them,
but if I go down as well...

<snd:Greeting_01>Please help take out the monsters.
You're the only one who can do it!
Talk1051: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>I'm on duty here. No time to chitchat.
Talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't burn yourself out. We've got to take
out every last one of those monsters!
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> is resurrecting monsters
all over the land.

So we plan on going <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> again to
<clr:0000>Fort Hateno<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>.
Talk1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>I'm getting ready to fight some monsters
here. Not a good time to distract me.
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>Come to think of it, Link, I was told that
you wield a <clr:0000>special swordâ€”one that cuts
down evil<clr:ffff> like no other sword can.
I don't mean to be rude, but...<sp:5:0:0>your
weapon doesn't seem all that different
from ours.
<snd:Understand_01>The one I heard about reveals its true
power when wielded by someone worthy.<sp:5:0:0>
Could...that be it?
Ah well, I'll be the first to admit when
there's a gap in my knowledge.
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sigh>I'm sorry, but we're in the middle of a
mission here. Can the conversation wait
until later?
Talk1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_01>We came here to take out a nest
of monsters...

But...I can't seem to find them.
Talk1054:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Admiration_01>At the moment, we're closing in on a
monster stronghold up ahead.

Once we <clr:0000>approach<clr:ffff> their base, we'll wait
for the right opportunity and then <clr:0000>launch
our attack<clr:ffff>.
<snd:Understand_01>I apologize if I'm being presumptuous,
but running into you here feels like fate...

I must say, nothing would be more
encouraging than to have you, Hyrule's
best swordsman, assist us.
<snd:Greeting_01>If we work together, I'm sure we could
bring peace back to this land.
Talk1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Understand_01>Oh wow!<sp:5:0:0> You defeated the monsters for
us? Again?!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>I guess I underestimated you. You really
are a master swordsman.
Talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Aha! If it isn't, Link!<sp:5:1:0> I was sure we'd
meet again!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Unfortunately, there's no time to enjoy
this reunion...

It's the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>. It revived those awful
monsters, and now they're a scourge to
this region.
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:WorkHeavy_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>But mark my words!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>The monster-control crew is here, and
their foul days are numbered!

If you would, please help us. I'm certain
we can bring peace to this region!
Talk1056: <sp:3:0:2:0000>If you're here, Link, does that mean...
Talk1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I hope I get the chance to fight beside
you again.
Talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>What!<sp:5:1:0> You took out the monsters for us?!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Link, how do I even begin to thank you?


Because of you, we can head to our next
mission with the squad at full strength.
Talk1063:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:CallFar_01><sp:1:3:4:6e000000>May you fight with the Goddess Hylia's
divine protection, brave swordsman!
Talk1015_01:
It's part of the bounty given to the
monster-control crew,<sp:5:0:0> so please don't
hesitate to accept it.
Talk1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Next time, I hope I get to see you in
action with my own eyes, Link.
Talk1059:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Is this some sort of trick? Have they
found a way to hide from us?
Talk1065:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Yesss!<sp:5:0:0> The danger is over!<sp:5:1:0>


Mission accomplished!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1066:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_00>Is everyone OK? What an incredible fight!<sp:5:0:0>
Hold on, I'm on my way!
Talk1067:
I'm incredibly grateful for your help, Link.<sp:5:0:0>
And I hate to impose, but could you come
with me for a minute?
Talk1068:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Is that you there, Link?!<sp:5:1:0> Hey...<sp:5:0:0>I see you
helped us out!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>I'm so grateful for all your assistance!<sp:5:1:0>
Could you join me for a moment?
Talk1069:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm Hoz, captain of squad one of the
monster-control crew.

After our search for Princess Zelda at
Hyrule Castle, I returned to my monster-
fighting duties.
PosterMessage:
Taking out monsters <clr:0000>south of here by
the Hyrule Garrison Ruins<clr:ffff>. -Captain Hoz,
Monster-Control Crew, Squad One
Near1010: <snd:Think_00>I can do this. I can do this.
Talk1022_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>When we came back to this place to clear
out the monsters, I never thought we'd be
lucky enough to have you join us again.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm sure you noticed, the monsters you
helped us defeat last time...<sp:5:0:0>the blood
moon brought them back.
<snd:Understand>I'm just grateful you were able to take
them out again, Link.
Talk1010: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I want a horse just like the captain's.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Admiration_01>My monster-control crew is in the middle
of taking out monsters that have dug in
around here.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sigh_01>I don't feel good about hanging back like
this while they wade into battle...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But if they're defeated, someone has
to be able to help the survivors.

So I'm giving orders from here.


<snd:Understand_01>But, Link, if you could join them and add
your considerable strength to theirs...
I'd feel far better.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Understand_00>As the commander, I'm so grateful for
every single ally who's joined the fight.<sp:5:1:0>
They fill me with hope.
But, Link, if you add your strength to
ours, I'm sure we can win this!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The last time we met was at Hyrule Castle,
if I remember right.
Near1024: I can do this. I can do this.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Did you come to help us?! If so, report to
the <clr:0000>captain on duty <clr:ffff>nearby!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Just incredible! No monster is a match
for you, eh, Link?
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Now's not a good time to chat! It's
dangerous, and the captain will be
real mad.
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>Come to think of it, Link, I was told that
you wield a <clr:0000>special sword<clr:ffff>â€”one more
magnificent than all the others.
I don't mean to be rude, but...<sp:5:0:0>your
weapon doesn't seem all that different
from ours.
<snd:Understand_01>The one I heard about reveals its true
power when wielded by someone worthy.<sp:5:0:0>
Could...that be it?
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Ah well, I'll be the first to admit when
there's a gap in my knowledge.
Talk1009: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Now is not the time for a chat!
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Link, I'm so grateful for everything you
did for us! If you don't mind, could you
come here for a moment?
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Ah, I'm so sorry. I nearly forgot something
very important...
